About Tipbox

Tipbox is a private inbox to receive anonymous tips.

Tips are encryted using PGP on the client side, once with the Tipbox private key, and a second time with the recipient's PGP key if one exists.

The encrypted message is then sent over a secure channel using HTTPS to our server, which takes care of sending the email over a secure channel to the recipient's email address.

We don't keep any logs in the process and we don't store any data. Only the recipient gets the email.
